name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Oh great, another adventurer. Just what this village needs. Well, if you're looking to get your gear upgraded, you're in the right place. I can turn your flimsy sword into something that might actually cut through butter. Or maybe you need some armor that doesn’t fall apart when a breeze hits it? Either way, I've got you covered... for a price, of course. So, what's it gonna be?
